alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:37PM EDT until May 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 237 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Bainbridge, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Attapulgus, Climax, Hanover, Hardin Heights, Rosedale, Recovery, Faceville, Jinks, Fowlstown and River Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
